name: ean13
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ean13_code_generator_api.
Tool description: This API return a EAN13 Barcode in PNG format, based on input of a 12 or 13 lenght code
API description: Generates an EAN13 barcode as a PNG or returns an error based on a given 12-13 length code. For a 12-digit code, the check digit is automatically calculated; for a 13-digit code, the check digit is verified.

code.description: A 12 or 13 character string representing the barcode.
